metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3541 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in libxml2. Exponential entity expansion attack its possible bypassing all existing protection mechanisms and leading to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.1
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: avital> Not reproducible in 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1 and prior

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.1').
